admin_tools_desc: Allows to list administration tools accessible by the current user.
my_workspaces_desc: Allows to list workspaces in which the current user is registered.
resources_desc: Allows to list resources accessible by the current user.
tools_desc: Allows to list tools accessible by the current user.
workspaces_desc: Allows to list workspaces visible by the current user. This includes workspaces that the user manages, in which he is registered or in which he can register.
resource_desc: Allows to display a selected resource.
personal_workspace_desc: Allows to display the root directory of the current user's personal workspace.
